hero.description: Super Mock - AI platform for conducting interviews in 6 languages with unique candidate and interviewer matching. 10+ professions, step-by-step learning materials and innovative trainers.

professions.title: 10+ Professions

projects.title: Mock Projects with Colleagues
projects.description: Learn teamwork in real projects. Collaborative development, code review and agile methodologies

professions.title: 10+ Professions for Interviews
professions.subtitle: Each profession goes through interviews in its own technology stack

about.title: About Super Mock Project
about.description1: Super Mock is an innovative platform for conducting interviews in 6 languages with unique AI matching of candidates and interviewers. We have combined multilingualism, artificial intelligence and modern communication technologies to create a tool that adapts to the language, technologies, profession and tools of each participant.
about.description2: Our platform supports 10+ professions with a complete preparation cycle: from step-by-step learning materials to innovative trainers, with personalized AI analysis and skill development recommendations.

contact.title: Start Learning on 10+ Professions
contact.subtitle: Join the multilingual community with AI matching and trainers

footer.description: AI assistant for interview preparation with Telegram integration and video calls
